Text: Sadly, tomorrow will be the last AOTS episode that will be uploaded.

thankyou so much for all the amazing ULds Alex. hope all goes well in you're work and home life

You will be missed

quote from AOTS 6.25 UL: Alright everyone, Everything good must come to an end. July will be my last month for capping / encoding. Work and real life is why I can no longer continue. These past few weeks I haven't even had time to watch the show only the live show on my days off from work. It's Been a good run.
life is not worth living without AotS
You will be sorely missed... thanks for all the hard work, best of luck! Where the hell will we get our AOTS fix now?
